text: Natia Kurdadze "YC landing page cheat codes every startup founder should know:" 24K How to create a high-converting landing page → Hero Section Keep the most important things at the top. Add an interactive demo. Use punchy copywriting. → Problem agitation + transformation Use vivid “before after” storytelling. Clearly mention the pain points. Explain how your product will solve it. → Social proof Add real people Customer logos Incorporate numbers → Pricing Use decoy effect & show three tiers Center the premium plan visually Label the premium as “most popular” → FAQ No page dump Highlight just a few Express your brand's personality → Footer Don't forget about legal section (TOS & Privacy Policy) Add comparison pages Add links to free tools If you want a high-converting landing page for your startup, schedule a discovery call with my team below ↓
